skill.name: applying-brand-guidelines
skill.description: This skill applies consistent corporate branding and styling to all generated documents including colors, fonts, layouts, and messaging
skill.summary: This skill applies consistent corporate branding and styling to all generated documents including co...
skill.author: anthropics

security_audit.summary: This skill contains only configuration and validation code for brand guidelines. It performs no network operations, file system access beyond its own directory, or code execution. The code is straightforward, well-documented, and matches its stated purpose of document branding validation.

content.user_title: Apply consistent corporate branding to documents
content.value_statement: Inconsistent branding damages professional credibility. This skill automatically validates and applies your corporate brand guidelines to ensure every document meets your standards.
actual_capabilities: Validates documents against brand color palettes
Checks font usage against approved typefaces
Validates brand name capitalization and usage
Applies consistent formatting to Excel, PowerPoint, and PDF documents
Provides compliance scoring and improvement suggestions
limitations: Requires brand guidelines to be configured in JSON format
Only validates content, cannot automatically fix violations
Limited to color, font, and tone validation
Default configuration uses Acme Corporation branding

use_cases.title: Ensure brand consistency
use_cases.description: Validate all external documents meet corporate brand standards before publication

use_cases.title: Apply professional formatting
use_cases.description: Automatically format Excel reports and PowerPoint presentations with correct brand colors and fonts

use_cases.title: Audit document compliance
use_cases.description: Check large volumes of documents for brand guideline adherence and generate compliance reports

prompt_templates.title: Basic validation
prompt_templates.scenario: Check if content follows brand guidelines
prompt_templates.prompt: Validate this content against our brand guidelines: [paste content]. Check for color usage, fonts, tone, and brand name usage.

prompt_templates.title: Document formatting
prompt_templates.prompt: Using the brand formatter, create a PowerPoint configuration for a quarterly business review with 12 slides including title slide and data slides.

prompt_templates.title: Custom guidelines
prompt_templates.prompt: Load brand guidelines from /path/to/brand.json and validate this marketing copy: [paste content]

prompt_templates.title: Batch validation
prompt_templates.prompt: Validate these document sections for brand compliance and provide a summary report: [paste multiple sections]

output_examples.input: Validate this content: Welcome to acme corporation! We offer cheap solutions with innovative excellence.
output: 1. Incorrect brand name capitalization: 'acme corporation' should be 'Acme Corporation'
1. Content may not align with brand tone. Consider using terms like: innovation, excellence, professional
1. Always capitalize brand name as: Acme Corporation
2. Incorporate brand tone keywords: innovation, excellence, professional

best_practices: Create a JSON file with your specific brand guidelines before starting validation
Run validation on content before finalizing any external-facing documents
Use the formatting functions to ensure consistent styling across all document types
anti_patterns: Do not manually edit brand colors in generated documents - always use the validator
Avoid using generic color names like 'blue' - always use exact hex codes from your brand palette
Never skip validation for external documents - inconsistent branding damages credibility

faq.question: Can I use this with my company's brand guidelines?
faq.answer: Yes, create a JSON file with your brand colors, fonts, and rules, then load it using load_guidelines_from_json()

faq.question: What document types are supported?
faq.answer: The skill validates any text content and can format Excel, PowerPoint, and PDF documents with brand styling

faq.question: How do I integrate this into my document workflow?
faq.answer: Use validate() to check content compliance, then apply_brand_to_document() to format documents with correct branding

faq.question: Is my brand data safe?
faq.answer: Yes, all processing happens locally. The skill does not send your brand guidelines or content to external services

faq.question: What if the validation finds violations?
faq.answer: The validator provides specific violations, warnings, and actionable suggestions to fix brand compliance issues

faq.question: Can it automatically fix brand violations?
faq.answer: The skill identifies violations and suggests corrections but requires manual implementation of the recommended changes
